nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_74
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Seven or eight officials are reported to have taken bribes and the mayor has decided to look into the affair in person.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_75
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: These workers regret yielding to the management's advice and going back to work. Now they are again faced with the threat of losing their jobs.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_76
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: You only need to fill out a form to get your membership, which entitles you to a discount on goods.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_77
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Their car broke down halfway for no reason. As a result they arrived three hours later than they had planned.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_78
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The official got involved in a scandal and was forced to resign weeks later.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_79
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The man living on welfare began to build up his own market, one step at a time and his business is thriving.
